articles.description: The Clippers are extending Paul George's contract for an additional four years at $190 million, his agent told ESPN.
articles.content: Six-time All-Star forward Paul George has signed a maximum contract extension with the LA Clippers that guarantees him as much as $226 million over the next five years, his agent, Aaron Mintz of CAA … [+3635 chars]

articles.description: Antoine Griezmann took to Instagram to announce that he was ending his sponsorship contract with Chinese telecoms giant Huawei.
